code: export var parseRAWGDate=function parseRAWGDate(i_DateString){var dateRegEx=/([12]\d{3}-(0[1-9]|1[0-2])-(0[1-9]|[12]\d|3[01]))/;if(dateRegEx.test(i_DateString)){var monthsShort=["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","June","July","Aug","Sept","Oct","Nov","Dec"];var date=i_DateString.split("-");var year=date[0];var month=monthsShort[parseInt(date[1])-1];var day=date[2];return"".concat(month," ").concat(day,", ").concat(year);}};
